analysis: The current project has a basic HTML structure with some CSS and JavaScript files. The theme is not yet focused on black holes, and there are no animated objects or slides related to black holes. The CSS file needs to be updated to include a cosmic theme with animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements. The HTML file should include sections related to black holes, and the JavaScript file should handle the animations and interactions for these sections.

improvements.description: Complete the CSS file with the full intended dark, cosmic theme including animations for black hole visuals, swirling effects, and glowing elements.
Complete the HTML content to ensure all sections are properly included, such as the main content area with interactive planets, animated slides, and other sections related to black holes.
Fix the syntax errors in the showSlide function and complete the JavaScript content to ensure all functions are properly implemented.
